name: Portal, Cargo (Artifact)
description: A 10m, 5 ton displacement device linked to a portal generator. A portal appears to be a shimmering disk ranging from 2 to 200 meters in diameter that is linked to a portal generator in a pocket universe. A portal is capable of transporting a person to a mated portal up to 36 light-minutes away.Thoughtfully-designed portals are easy to configure, while more functional versions will have a low Ease of Use index, with confusing or badly-placed controls.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
